answers.answer: Talk to your dr. i know im almost 16weeks and only gained just over half a kg my doctor says that sometimes happens but my baby is healthy

I have been meaning to but my doctor but  she just moves to fast and then the next thing I know im walking out the office asking my self okay what she say...lol next time im going to cut her off when shes talking...lol... Thanks!
Thats not.good u will need to tell her to shut up and let you get a word in. Your the.patient u have questions and concerns...
Make an appointment with your midwife. It may be that all of a sudden you pile on a few pounds.At 16 weeks I'd gained about 5lbs..I'm sure everything is fine but if you're concerned see the midwife.

I've only lost weight and I'm 18+4 your baby will grow whether you do or not if it has to suck the life out of you in the mean time trust me as for your doctor tell the nurse your concerns and tell her you want too speak too the doc about it and she'll make sure to tell her

I've only lost weight and I'm 18+4 your baby will grow whether you do or not if it has to suck the life out of you in the mean time trust me as for your doctor tell the nurse your concerns and tell her you want too speak too the doc about it and she'll make sure to tell her

Well either Ahcccs or you are paying your insurance to get a good doctor. If the Dr is not working for you change her. Because everytime you have a consult they charge the insurance hundreds of dollars and you are not even getting a simple question answered!On my case the PA said I should lose weight because I am over weight. Just eat healthier and smaller portions they said. I spoke to my Dr and she looked at me weird but said just stay away from carbs, juices, and sugar. Drink lots of water everyone in my fam looked surprised at a "diet" my dr had set. Well I lost 8lbs and I'm on week 21+4d and I'm hoping my baby is healthy since I haven't gained weight and it puts me away from diabetes and preeclampsia or high Bp. So as long as ur eating healthy it doesn't matter if you lose or gain. Baby still gains weight :)

question: Okay im not gaining any kinda weight??? Is that okay when your 5months pregnant??
title: gaining Weight???
